System Requirements:

DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Flash Version: 9.0

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Diner Dash 2 Restaurant Rescue_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Join Flo as she returns from Nirvana to help 4 fellow restaurant owners defeat the greedy tycoon, Mr. Big, in Diner Dash 2! Help Flo seat customers, take orders, serve drinks, deliver food, and collect tips inside one of the most popular diners in town! Hold on to your hair-net and get ready to meet new quirky characters with fun challenges inside a surprise restaurant setting. Gain powerups to boost your score and earn more decor upgrades in this amazing sequel to the original smash hit!
